name: Not Super Not Mario
description:
Made for the Global Game Jam 2018 (theme: Transmission), Not Super Not Mario starts out like a normal platformer which quickly becomes glitched.

In the glitch-world, the main character can't use any powers anymore, but can transmit them to the enemies instead, forcing them to use them on the spot - which can lead to them jumping on spikes, offing one another, etc...

You can find its Global Game Jame page here : https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/not-super-not-mario
